news.content:
ThreeFold Grid 2.3 Release

The release introduces some improvements to the grid’s stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. Many thanks to the development team who made this release happen!

Release note: https://manual.threefold.io/#/release_notes_2.3.0
news.excerpt: The release introduces some improvements to the grid’s stability, new features and more.

next.title: ThreeFold at Barcelona Blockchain Week
next.excerpt: On 6th October at 1pm CEST our very own rocket scientist Weynand Kuijpers will be representing ThreeFold.
